messages.content: How do I install Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes?
To install Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes, you should place `hakkun_nodes.py` into `ComfyUI\custom_nodes`. It is also available for installation through the Manager, with a link to its GitHub page.
Where can I find an example of how to use Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes?
To check usage examples for all nodes, you can drag and drop `hakkun_nodes_workflow.png` into ComfyUI.
How can I access the custom nodes provided by Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes?
All custom nodes provided by Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes can be found in the 'Hakkun' category.
Can I use the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes prompt parser to write both positive and negative prompts in one text field?
Yes, the prompt parser allows you to write both positive and negative prompts in one text field.
What special syntax can I use in the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes prompt parser?

In the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes prompt parser, you can use '@' to separate positive and negative prompts, '!' to ignore lines, '?' to set the probability of ignoring lines with percentages, square brackets for random selection, and '*' to assign weight to elements.
How can I insert external text into the prompt in Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes?
You can insert external text into the prompt by using `<extra1>` or `<extra2>` placeholders, and the provided text will be inserted before parsing.
Can I set custom tags in Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes?
Yes, you can apply custom tags by inputting a 'tags' string or loading a text file from the 'tags_file' (full path).
What does the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes 'Multi Text Merge' node do?
It allows you to join multiple texts by a specified delimiter, and use new lines as the delimiter if required.
What does the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes 'Random Line' node do?
It outputs a random line from the input.
What does the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes 'Random Line 4' node do?
It outputs random lines from four textfields/inputs and joins them by a specified delimiter.
What does the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes 'Calculate Upscale' node do?
It outputs the target upscale float value based on the input image height and calculates the tile size (with and height) for tools like UltimateSDUpscale by specified number of horizontal tiles.
What does the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes 'Image size to string' node do?
It outputs the input image size in a format such as '512x768'.
What does the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes 'Any Converter' node do?
It is a universal primitive type converter that converts strings to numbers if possible, or else assigns them a value of 0.
What does the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes 'Image Resize To Height/Width' node do?
It resizes images to the desired width or height. It supports batches and uses the Lanczos method.
What does the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes 'Load text' node do?
It simplifies the loading of text files, which is somehow not available in other nodes that would work.
What does the Hakkun-ComfyUI-nodes 'Load Random Image' node do?
It returns one random image ('.jpg', '.jpeg', '.png', '.webp') from a passed directory and its file name (without extension).
